sectiontitles.title: Nice to meet you, my name is Lucas Viana!

homeslider: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change
Step to Go aims to improve learning in the world of programming!
Discover my projects and my proposal to help people looking to present themselves in this market!

hero.description: I love technology, with over 5 years of experience in development. I created this website to show what I can do and to start a shared learning project in the programming area!

timeline.event: I started my technical course and had my first contact with programming.
I started my studies in HTML, CSS and programming logic by developing pseudocodes and flowcharts.
I had my first contact with the Java language. I started object oriented with Java and created my first web projects with PHP.
I created my first relational databases in MySQL. I presented my first web project with HTML, PHP and MySQL.
I created my first projects with C# and deepened my studies in Javascript.
I presented my undergraduate project. A web application for event management. I graduated as a computer technician.
I started my degree in Systems Analysis and Development. I revisited the content I had already studied and also learned advanced programming content.
I got my first job in the area, at the time as a QA. After that, I moved to another area within the company, becoming a development intern.
I worked on projects such as C&A, Chatuba and Obramax, building applications based on ReactJS and VTEX IO.
I developed my undergraduated project in college, an internship application, built with React Native, NodeJS and MySQL
After the successful presentation of my project, I graduated as a Systems Analyst and Developer!
I had my first contact with the Jamstack and Headless CMS architecture working on the Plurix project and also Vivara.
At Adaptio, I learned the Deno Fresh framework and developed a product page for the 'Aviator' shirt store.
Studying hard and looking for new opportunities in the market!!!

contact.description: Did you like what you saw here? Contact me by email and hire my services!
contact.whatsapp: You can also contact me personally, via WhatsApp!

Footer.description: I am available for new opportunities. Get in touch to work together!
Footer.copyright: Design and development by Lucas Viana
